name: Apocalypse Rewind
description:
You find yourself in the zombie apocalypse with the one machine that can turn it all around, the time machine. You must keep it safe long enough for it to charge and rewind the time. Are you up to the task?

Note: if you're having trouble running the game in the browser(either very high sensitivity or low frame rate), consider downloading the windows version. It will likely not have any of these problems.

This game is our entry in Brackeys' 4th game jam.

Theme : Rewind
